title: Nukitashi the Animation Specials

alternative_titles.ja: ぬきたし THE ANIMATION OVA

synopsis:
Short Specials included in the Blu-ray volumes, each volume have two episodes. 

1. "Hinami Becomes a Mommy at Babumi Kindergarten"
Mufu-mufu footage of Hinami at Babumi Kindergarten.

2. "Misaki Gets the Massages Everyone Else Is Getting"
Mufu-mufu footage of Misaki and massages.

3. "Kaachan: Okan, Kanojo, Nanase"
Mufu-mufu footage of Nanase at home.

4. "Master's Pet"
Mufu-mufu footage of Fumino with a collar.
